pillow@marriage.name: pillow
pillow@marriage.desc[0]: A plush, velvet pillow sits here.

marriage1@marriage.title: Gazebo Altar
marriage1@marriage.description:
This is a large open park set in the area just outside Boston.
The air smells fresh and sweat, making this a wonderful place to be wed.
Dominating the center of the park is a large gazebo, decorated with
flowers of many kinds.

preacher@marriage.name: preacher
preacher@marriage.description: The faithul, and quaint preacher of the MUD stands here, viewing you with a calm, kind eye.

ring_bearer@marriage.name: ring_bearer
ring_bearer@marriage.description: A young boy, dressed in a tuxedo stands here dressed in a small childs tuxedo.
